website_summaries.verdict: The premium outdoor love seat to choose if you want the most amount of comfort and a unique sitting experience.
pros: Hanging design turns the love seat into a small swing
The seat itself uses extra padding to increase the ergonomic support and comfort while sitting
Metal frame is sturdy to hold the weight of two average adults
cons: More difficult to move around and set up due to the extra weight

customer_reviews.title: My first review ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review ever, however the kids love this chair I felt I needed to let everyone know just how comfortable it is and how great it looks. It is very well-designed. It is very difficult to hang, the build process is simple up to the point of hanging the chair. Luckily my fifteen-year-old daughter was able to help me and we got it on but it would have been almost near impossible for one person to complete this task. Overall I am ecstatic with this purchase so far
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: No pillow included
customer_reviews.text: You would assume that this comes with the pillow but alas, no pillow included. After contacting the seller they just shrugged it off, so beware that you may have to purchase a pillow to go with this. I did set it up and assembly was easy, but it's kind of useless without some padding to cover up the metal beams.
customer_reviews.author: Mick B

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small patio in my apartment and I wanted something that rocked and could fit in the limited space. After looking at all my options, I took a chance on this rocking love seat. I'm happy that I did because now I'm spending more time outside! The gentle rocking is very calming and my roommates enjoy using it just as much! All in all, I'd recommend this love seat to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: if you enjoy lounging across metal rods, this chair’s for you!
customer_reviews.text: This chair looks great and the quality of the actual basket and stand is very high. Unfortunately, the cushion is so cheap and thin that it feels as if there is no cushion under you at all! Super disappointed because the reviews were so good - makes me wonder if they are actually legit reviews because this chair is extremely uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Best apartment balcony purchase yet.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite chair. It holds my weight. It doesn't do that squeaky thing most metals do after a while and when it gets wet, I simply strip it and toss it in my dryer or sometimes I toss it into my washer and dryer and toss it back on the swing. My apartment balcony isn't that big so I was skeptical that it wouldn't fit but it fits perfectly. It's not too big. It takes up about a third of my balcony and I still have room to play with the rest of my balcony. Love it. Try it for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Looks and quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product😊. Assembly was not as difficult as I thought it would be. In fact it was easy. Tool was included for convenience. For the price, It’s very sturdy and comfy and it looks nice in my yard. Again!! I love this product. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Dina clarke

customer_reviews.title: great mount, super cheap materials, bends neck over
customer_reviews.text: First off, the mount is sturdy, thats not the issue. The big issues are 1. the curve is so that you cant sit in the chair, you can only slouch/ lay down, and 2. The material they use for the webbing is cheap plastic. They went all out for the frame, and then super cheap on the webbing and cushions. Too bad its massive, and no way to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The pins are hard but a goo seat me and my daughter it’s awesome
customer_reviews.author: Chiquita M Plowman

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Omgosh, I love this thing. I am competing with my 8 year old to spend time in it. I realize it is meant for outdoors, but we have it in our entry room. Thinking about buying another for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this chair
customer_reviews.text: We love this chair. Its too small for my husband and I to sit on it, but it is large enough for 2 kids to sit on it. I wish the cushon was more padded, but who can complain for a chair under $300.
customer_reviews.author: MBridenstine

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. 1st it took a lot of swears and some tears setting it up. Very hard and my deck got scratched and ruined. 2nd it is VERY uncomfortable. If you like sitting on metal bars then this chairs for you. If you like sitting in comfort then look else wear. For the price I am very disappointed. I would definitely return it but there is no way I could disassemble it and return the heavy package, which was damaged when arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Never Got to Enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this chair twice and both times I was sent the wrong color. I attempted to write a negative review and amazon rejected it. I found this same swing, smaller and cheaper at Weis. It’s beautiful & comfortable and worth the money. I’ve attached a picture of the swing I found at Weis. Which was not the vibrant red I received from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: dway

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: the pillow that was sent is too thin so that the ribbing in the chair digs into your back. it needs an extra pillow or two.
customer_reviews.author: choraldiva

customer_reviews.title: very pretty and big
customer_reviews.text: farely easy to assemble except actually hanging the chair, takes more then 2 people
customer_reviews.author: jenifa

customer_reviews.title: Be careful you don't cut yourself
customer_reviews.text: Item was already rusted. There were paint chiped on the hooks that are extremely visible. The screws were hard to put in because the burs were not ground off. And the edges were extremely sharp. We had to file down in order to assemble product.
customer_reviews.author: renee33

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I received a hanging "egg" chair for Christmas this past year and absolutely love it so I purchased this loveseat one for my sister for her wedding present. They love it too. It fits both of them comfortably or she can spread out on it herself. It's super comfortable, relaxing and would recommend it for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Daigle

customer_reviews.title: It’s huge. Make sure you have enough indoor space if using it indoors.
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely not a one man job. I struggled fixing the catching pins on my own but I made it. That’s the part that took most time. Hanging the chair was not a problem for me. I added a fleece blanket cover to the cushion for comfort and warmth. I am 5’4” and can curl up pretty nicely in it. Am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maha

customer_reviews.title: It is so comfortable and they love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my daughter and her family. It is so comfortable and they love it. It was worth the money and shipped in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs. I purchased the smaller red one and loved it so much that I got this larger one to go outside. They are comfortable but the padding on the smaller one is thicker. The padding on the bigger one came torn so I am requesting another one from the manufacturer because I do not want to have to send this back. But great chair!
customer_reviews.author: Tohya

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVEEEE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great buy! I love it sooo much. The only time I'm not in it, is when the sun is shining right on me (1pm-4pm) due to where my patio is. But is so comfy and was very easy to assemble. I'm a bit of a DIYer though. The only thing that took some time was wrapping and tie the straps around the top. The directions have pics but they're in black and white and the straps are black so its hard to see clearly. But other than that no issues at all! Love love love this! Def a great buy for one or two (small) people.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Scruggs

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my son living with Autism happy and quiet...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son living with Autism. He loves it and enjoys swinging in it. His siblings are enjoying it too. It took some muscle to open the “pumpkin” shape all the way and put the screws in to hold it open. After struggling with it for about 20 minutes, we finally covered the metal with a towel (to prevent scratching the frame) and had to hammer the metal joint to fully open it. Make sure you have two people to hang it up on the frame. The cushion is nice, but it slides down and hangs over the edge of the swing. Thinking Velcro might fix this issue. Happy with it overall!
customer_reviews.author: HapaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The padding to this chair is horrible I can feel every bar on my back and on my butt they need to supply better cushion my cushion falls off all the time when I get on it I slide off with it there's no support for the cushion it just slips I would recommend this chair be $150 not $400
customer_reviews.author: camil

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give this product more than 5 stars. This swing is fantastic. I sit in it so much. Always wanted swing but didn’t want to suspend from ceiling, which can be difficult. This swing, on its frame, sits in my living room and it is used constantly. It is very strong, stable and so comfortable. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gourdbeader1

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It is made well. The metal is strong. The mesh is great because it won't show dirt like fabric and allows a person laying in the swing to still see people outside. I only have 2 complaints: 1) There is not enough clearance to allow it to swing freely without knocking into the C arch. Maybe it needs a more curved arch? When assembling, you have to pull the collapsed skeletal bars back enough to fit the bolts into the holes. This was a bit difficult by myself. Otherwise this is the best swing for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Roderick Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great concept still some work needed
customer_reviews.text: Overall product is great. We had to improvise with some of the nuts as some holes were fused closed. Connections are a little sloppy so we used tape around the ends before connecting to make it more sturdy. The cushion that comes with the item doesn’t stay in place and you can feel the bar when you sit so I had to order another cushion for extra support. But the swing is really nice and will be even better when I get the extra cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: T Fagan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hanging chair! I looked at different ones for awhile prior to choosing. I am 5’9” and I can sit sideways comfortably. I can sit straight between my 12yr and 13 yr old boys! Downfall it shows in YouTube video easy set up. It took my husband, son, and myself to pull open the “pumpkin” to put in the 4 pins that secure it open. Other than that it is worth the money and we are very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase !!!
customer_reviews.text: This chair/loveseat is AWESOME! Frame went together really easy. The seat was a little harder. Thanks to the one that said use some wood or a book to set the framework to secure the frame with screws. Believe me this chair is worth it
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy, comfy, nice
customer_reviews.text: Hard to assemble, need strong 3 person. Rest everything it is amazing, comfy, my kid uses it as second bed, funny huh!!! But yes for 2 midsize adult and 1 kid, seating comfortably. Good, go for it. You need additional one flat sheet, 2 xs size pillow and this needs some ties to hold the sofa mattress in place
customer_reviews.author: Amit

customer_reviews.title: Comfy AF.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about this swing!! Best purchase ever. Perfect for sitting on our porch during a great Florida thunderstorm!! It’s super comfy and roomy! I highly recommend this swing!
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 3 days
customer_reviews.text: Was a great chair but it broke after 3 days as I was sitting in it with my kids. Our combined weight of 270lbs is way under the 400lbs limit stated in the instructions. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: V.H.

customer_reviews.title: Okay at best
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and looks great. VERY uncomfortable after a few sittings. The cushion absolutely sucks and it feels like you're basically sitting on the bars after a few weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: That Vegetarian Guy

customer_reviews.title: FOR KIDS WITH AUTISM IS FANTASTIC.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I got it as a present for my kids on Christmas. THEY ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT. I use it inside. It really is a 2 people project but is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mayelin Josefina Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I love then idea of the chair... however it was ridiculous to assemble. The included paper instruction were completely faded and impossible to read. I had to look instructions up online. It talked about parts as if you knew what they were without a description. We ( my husband and i) had to disassemble the chair to put some hooks on because the holes absolutely would not line up. One of the holes in the metal had to be filed out in order to put a pin through it. My husband is a very smart mechanical engineer and this was difficult to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rough Assembly; Great once assembled
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly did I have trouble putting this together by myself. For the most part I had no trouble, but Inserting the four bolts when the hanging pumpkin is fully extended took many attempts and buckets of sweat before I was finally able to get it. However.. now that it’s put together I’m in love with it. It really is a unique piece to bring together a balcony/patio. I’ve seen other complaints about it being uncomfortable with the metal bars but I don’t find it bad at all with the included pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: You’re going to need help with this.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you have someone help you assemble this contraption. The instructions were more than likely written by children and the accordion, that is, the part that is the actual chair, is damn near impossible to keep open when you try to enter the pins that keep it fanned out. It took me 3 hours to set this thing up, considering how simple it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie O.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assembly, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! We purchased for our daughters Christmas present and it was a huge hit. They love hanging out all wrapped up in the blankets reading or watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: SJP Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but hard to stretch out
customer_reviews.text: Love this pumpkin chair swing!! Super comfortable! Was hard to steph out the swing basket. Only could get 3 out of 4 screws in to stretch out the seat. Hope that by sitting it it will loosen a bit to get the last one in
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! Sturdy and comfortable. I did have to get help with assembly, I was able to insert 3 of the 4 pins for the chair by myself but had to get a second set of hands to get the fourth pin in. Also kudos to Flower House customer service, I did not have the long pin needed to hang the chair. Called Flower House and within 4 days the missing pin arrived in the mail
customer_reviews.author: Ute

customer_reviews.title: Big and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. Only problem with it the it needs a firm bottom under custom so you don’t feel the bars. We cut a thin board and put it inside bottom piece. That did the trick and store it so it is water proof. Great product
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Awful to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was so painful to assemble. The design is such that putting the pins into the bar to hold the pumpkin shape is very finicky. It took two people an afternoon to finally get the tension right to get all for support pins in place. Deeply unpleasant experience, would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Margret Steele

customer_reviews.title: Great once assembled.
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and watch any YouTube video about assembly. I was ready to chuck this thing over the hill before I realized there was a better way. Once put together, it’s a super comfortable, sturdy chair.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony E Thomas

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair - I was able to put it together myself - super comfortable - easy to move once put together. (I have it on my deck and move it around to clean) very sturdy - nice that it has two pockets to hold phone , snacks, a bottle (may be a beer)
customer_reviews.author: MCF

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!!❤❤❤
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love my chair!! I have it in my bedroom and it's my way of life! After a long day I grab my electric blanket and live in my chair. 😍😍😍its so cozy!! 😂
customer_reviews.author: msdi

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until it broke !!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it until it suddenly snapped while I was sitting in it !! Let me also state that I am a pretty avg size woman ,and I was sitting in it and it suddenly snapped !
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This feels like a nest to me. Got so many compliments on it. So comfortable and large. I'm 5.8 tall and can easily lay in there - put my legs up and relax. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elvijs-Kristians

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! (with an extra cushion)
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks!! I only gave 4 stars because I added an extra cushions on the bottom for comfort. Add a few pillows and a blanket and it's a cozy pod! The gentle rocking motion is incredibly soothing. Placed in front of a floor to ceiling window, it feels like a mini vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy doc

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad purchase, needs a better cushion
customer_reviews.text: This would be easiest to assemble with two people, but i did it by myself. Not the easiest, but doable. It’s a nice size. I’m 5’3 and can stretch out in it. My only real issue is that the cushion isn’t very thick and so you feel the bars. I think I’ll add some pillows to it. Maybe even get more stuffing the the cushion it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: A Pain to Assemble Alone
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chair, sure, but im pissed because this is not something you can assemble alone. The pins that goes into the pumpkin itself is a huge pain to put in. I tried so hard that i Cut myself multiple times and hurt my finger. Awful assembly design for the seat itself. Also pissed that it is cheaper at Walmart. Didnt feel like going through the return process on such a heavy piece I would not be able yo go drop off at UPS. For the aseembly reason, i give this chair a 3!
customer_reviews.author: Kai C Hsieh

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, nice addition to existing ensemble. Difficult to attach spring and hooks, but other than that very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa S.

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: Well built, good price for the quality you get, package arrived broken and some metal parts scratched, otherwise I would have given a 5 star. Instruction needs to improve especially the photos were small and in poor resolution in black and white
customer_reviews.author: IceQueen

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get all the parts right
customer_reviews.text: In the picture and review it comes with an metal chain on the top but to me it came with fabric part because of that it turns automatically... very unhappy with the product
customer_reviews.author: nisa

customer_reviews.title: This things huge!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! This thing is exactly what I was hoping it would be. Super comfy! My husband needed a extra set of hands when putting in the last screw, but other than that, he seemed to put it together pretty quick. This thing is durable, huge, and fits perfectly on the patio. I’m excited about some time outside cuddled up with my husband and baby.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, comfortable, sturdy, and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome chair! This is a sturdy and super-comfy chair that looks beautiful in my backyard. It was easy to assemble and is the perfect size to curl up in and read a book. I had read some reviews online that said they were missing pieces or had issues with the chair. Mine was great and came with everything in the box. The cushions are big and comfy and It looks like it will be very weatherproof. I am totally satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: This will make you want to enjoy the outside
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself for my birthday. Daughter and her friend liked it so much I gave my daughter one for her birthday. Since it's winter, she decided to put hers inside. She loves it after a day at work and told me she curls up in it and falls asleep. Very comfortable indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Rosann R. Williford

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Have it on my patio & couldn’t be happier. Was HORRIBLE to put those last screws in but once I (with help) got past that, I had no regrets. My pups love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Ann L.

customer_reviews.title: Great swing for Balcony
customer_reviews.text: Strong swing for balcony. Is great for 2 people and have a drink holder. Really strong frame.
customer_reviews.author: bancnn

customer_reviews.title: Heavy...Need two strong people to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! It is very comfortable...my grandson fell asleep in it! It is very heavy and needs two strong people to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lutz

customer_reviews.title: I have to pry my sister out of the chair because she is so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It takes two people to put this chair together but it is definitely worth it and comfort
customer_reviews.author: joni levinson

customer_reviews.title: Big enough to snuggle
customer_reviews.text: People constantly ask where we got this swing. Comfy and cute. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Joelle Pond

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sofa loveseat. I was a little concerned when we had strong winds and rain. The chair withstood the winds. This chair is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Dee from FTW

customer_reviews.title: Super cozy
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair, however we have had to add extra padding because the bars can be uncomfortable. The first one broke at the base, but they replaced it and the new base hasn’t had any issues. It was somewhat difficult and definitely takes at least two people to stretch the chair out.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Vasbinder

customer_reviews.title: Great swing and quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter and she loves reading and relaxing in it. It’s very sturdy. It’s a bit difficult to assemble but worth it since it’s very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, strong, durable, great for indoors AND outdoors, and even holds two people. Perfect addition to my apartment!
customer_reviews.author: Marina Sumrada

customer_reviews.title: Noooooo
customer_reviews.text: Missing assembly items. Unable to assemble, holes don't line up even with force used. Do not but.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Wollard

customer_reviews.title: it is easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: it's a wonderful and very secure seat but be aware that solid build means some weight so try to assemble it with someone to help
customer_reviews.author: karen baughman

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I love it! Very comfortable. Frame is very sturdy and well built. Very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Arhh

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product came damaged and without a lot of the pieces needed to put it together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite purchases
customer_reviews.text: I love studying in this hammock. I am there every day and I love being in it
customer_reviews.author: Aris tibayan

customer_reviews.title: Great Swing
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable & relaxing. I really love this swing that I bought another for my summer home
customer_reviews.author: Laura Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to a patio
customer_reviews.text: I love this hanging chair. I bought a few extra throw pillows to lounge outside in my backyard and read. It has a few pockets to keep water bottles. It was a little difficult to assemble and you need at least 2 people, but otherwise it's a fabulous chair!
customer_reviews.author: Mallika

customer_reviews.title: Totally awesome
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my daughters apartment. It’s in her living room with lots of cute pillows. Everyone fights to sit in it and she, her roommates and their friends Love Love Love it. They are going to buy another one when they move to a bigger place.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy R

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Great great great chair. Holds me at 320lbs. Assembly was mostly easy not requires 2 people to spread the chair (use a pole or wall to brace the center. Despite assembly difficulty, I love it. It is super sturdy and well-built!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Brown

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Most uncomfortable chair ever. I’m 5’8” and feel that I am too tall for the chair! You can feel the metal poles. Poor design!
customer_reviews.author: MSutton

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a pretty nice chair. But getting all the screws in the base was impossible. Actually had to leave one out because there is no way it was going to go in. I wasn’t impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Dean M. Wells

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this chair!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is so comfy! Big enough to lie down on with your legs bent. I have taken a nap on it outside a few times now!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Hammock collapses
customer_reviews.text: Sucks. My chair collapses. I can’t sit on it. Looks like manufacturing defect.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Its nice comfortable and beautiful! Will recommend
customer_reviews.author: Marlena

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable for people 6ft and taller.
customer_reviews.text: When I sit in the seat I have to slouch or else my head touches the top. Also, one of the pieces were missing for assembly, but it seems to work just fine without it.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Must have.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my second hanging pumpkin. Its more than a novelty act. 17 months now and its quite comfortable and had to buy another. My friends really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory G. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well
customer_reviews.text: The pad slides down a lot. Otherwise we have been happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila E.

customer_reviews.title: Unstable
customer_reviews.text: The swing is very unstable for someone to try to get in and out. Assembly was another pain.
customer_reviews.author: Leo1

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful result
customer_reviews.text: Really difficult to build as one person, but an amazing product. Recruit a friend to build!! Lol
customer_reviews.author: JB in Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Love it, my granddaughter took it over, but we all like to sit in it
customer_reviews.author: Wuppett

customer_reviews.title: Help, need a new one
customer_reviews.text: It’s bent so I can’t use it!? Need a new one!
customer_reviews.author: emily brede

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it and it's comfortable!! It wasn't easy to put the pins in but the rest was easy. The box came in beat up and I was afraid that it was ruined but no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl S. Morr

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this thing. I did buy another cushion for it to be more comfortable. The one that came with it was not so great.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great place to chill
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Did it by myself in about an hour. So relaxing. I can't wait to get home from work and relax in it.
customer_reviews.author: LAURA SAVAGE

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So happy to have made this purchase. Definitely a great investment looks great in my house, the maroon is more of a red but works great, supports quite a bit of weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Cottini

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: My pups and I love our chair. It was easy to put together and as the weather improves I know we are going to love it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great swing!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted! Neutral color and comfortable to sit on and swing. Need two people to assemble the chair, very hard.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanna Poiani

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good condition. Easy to assemble. As comfortable as I imagined.
customer_reviews.author: Constance P

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and sturdy product! My wife has a "happy" place in our house now :) I only wish to get a small motor that rocks the swing automatically. Either way great product and stability!
customer_reviews.author: DGQ

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy enough to put together, and comfortable enough to sleep in.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Kneeland

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again if it ever breaks
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to put together as a single body, but if someone pulls while you put the pins in place to get it open, it's not so bad. Its sturdy and holds up to 300lbs. I love the seat!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Relaxation...
customer_reviews.text: It took my son (16 yrs) and I a lot of tug and pull and YouTube videos to assemble... ONE bolt was stubborn but so am I - all told: worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to assemble (Putting the pins in was the only frustrating part). Pretty comfy although the cushion could be a bit softer. It holds me up and swings well.
customer_reviews.author: JASON ARTIS

customer_reviews.title: Comfort Comfort Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Words cannot describe how much we love this! First, it was easy to assemble. The color is beautiful, The best part...it is so comfortable! Have it in a covered space that protects it from the elements, but it still gets the breeze. A perfect place to relax, read, or nap. We are pleased with the construction and feel it will last for a long time. Can see we may have to add another as guests are drawn to it as much as we are. Grandkids love that it "rocks" them to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: lady79601

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the best and most comfortable chair ever! Beyond happy I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: pjsmomyayayayayayayaya

customer_reviews.title: Most comfy chair!
customer_reviews.text: My kiddos and I love this chair! I love to sit outside and read and an hour quickly turns into 3. Just extremely relaxing!
customer_reviews.author: shoes2002

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product!
customer_reviews.text: I actually got it on sale so considering the price and the quality and looks definitely five * !
customer_reviews.author: Todd
